description: Let b(k) be the k-th term of the flattened irregular array where the m-th row contains the positive divisors of m. (b(k) = A027750(k).) Let c(k) be the k-th term of the flattened irregular array where the m-th row contains the positive integers that are <= m and are coprime to m. (c(k) = A038566(k).) Then a(n) = gcd(b(n),c(n)).
